stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question.

features.html:
For each of the following statements, indicate whether it is true, false, or uncertain and explain why.

  1. Average total cost is always greater than average variable cost by a constant amount.

  2. In the short run, a perfectly competitive firm always maximizes profit when average total cost is at minimum.

  3. If a firm shuts down in the short run, its profits will equal zero.
